changes: SECTION_11.md - FEATURE - v11.9: Efficiency Factor (EF = NP ÷ Avg HR) added to Validated Optional Metrics with trend tracking (improving/stable/declining). Report templates updated across all four levels

SECTION_11.md - FEATURE - v11.8: Per-Sport Threshold Schema — thresholds.sports keyed by sport family, cross-sport application forbidden, deterministic collision resolution, FTP Governance clarified as cycling-specific. sync.py implementation pending

SECTION_11.md - FEATURE - v11.7: Workout Reference Library Integration — 26 session templates (v0.5.0), selection rules, sequencing enforcement, WU/CD mandates, audit traceability via session_template field
sync.py - FEATURE - v3.6.0: Efficiency Factor tracking — pulls icu_efficiency_factor from API, aggregates 7d/28d in capability namespace with qualifying filters (cycling, VI ≤ 1.05, ≥ 20min)
sync.py - FIX - v3.5.1: HRV outlier filter — _is_valid_hrv() helper filters sensor errors (10-250ms range), applied to baselines, Recovery Index, persistence counts, summaries
sync.py - UPDATE: Planned workouts display window extended from 21 to 42 days
SETUP_ASSISTANT.md - NEW FILE: AI-guided setup assistant — golden path framing, web chat vs agent path, tested across 6 AI platforms
examples/workout-library/ - NEW: Workout Reference Library v0.5.0 — 26 structured session templates with YAML metadata, progression logic, deload variants, decision matrix
examples/reports/ - UPDATE: All report templates and examples updated with EF metric (per-session, aggregate, by-week trajectory)
PRE_WORKOUT_TEMPLATE.md - FIX: Renamed to PRE_WORKOUT_REPORT_TEMPLATE.md for naming consistency
